SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT s.* , REPLACE(s.SPL_NAME, ' ', '') SEARCH_SPL_NAME , REPLACE(s.SPL_CTGR, ' ', '') SEARCH_SPL_CTGR , REPLACE(#{searchKeyword}, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_KEYWORD FROM SUPPLY s) WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND SEARCH_SPL_NAME LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'
AND SEARCH_SPL_CTGR LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT SPL_ID , SPL_NAME , SPL_CTGR , SPL_PRICE , INV_QTY , DEL_YN , SPL_IMG , SPL_DTL , SPL_REGT_ID , SPL_MDFR_ID , SPL_REGT_DT , SPL_MDF_DT , REPLACE(SPL_NAME, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_SPL_NAME , REPLACE(SPL_CTGR, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_SPL_CTGR , REPLACE(#{searchKeyword}, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_KEYWORD FROM SUPPLY) WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND SEARCH_SPL_NAME LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'
AND SEARCH_SPL_CTGR LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'
SELECT SPL_ID , SPL_NAME , SPL_CTGR , SPL_PRICE , INV_QTY , DEL_YN , SPL_IMG , SPL_DTL , SPL_REGT_ID , SPL_MDFR_ID , SPL_REGT_DT , SPL_MDF_DT FROM SUPPLY WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND SPL_ID = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUPPLY (SPL_ID , SPL_NAME , SPL_CTGR , SPL_PRICE , INV_QTY , DEL_YN , SPL_IMG , SPL_DTL , SPL_REGT_ID , SPL_MDFR_ID , SPL_REGT_DT , SPL_MDF_DT) VALUES ('SPL_' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '_' || LPAD(SEQ_SUPPLY_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{splName} , #{splCtgr} , #{splPrice} , #{invQty} , 'N' , #{splImg} , #{splDtl} , #{splRegtId} , NULL , SYSDATE , NULL)
